headline: American Electric Power Company, Inc. (AEP): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on American Electric Power Company, Inc. on Paradox’s Substack by PARADOX INTELLIGENCE. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on AEP. American Electric Power Company, Inc.’s share was trading at $115.66 as of October 6th. AEP’s trailing and forward P/E were 16.64 and 18.12 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. […]

headline: AEP Increases Quarterly Dividend to 95 Cents a Share
summary: The Board of Directors of American Electric Power (Nasdaq: AEP) has declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of 95 cents per share on the company's common stock, an increase of 2 cents per share.

raw.headline: AEP Increases Quarterly Dividend to 95 Cents a Share
raw.summary: The Board of Directors of American Electric Power (Nasdaq: AEP) has declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of 95 cents per share on the company's common stock, an increase of 2 cents per share.

headline: How Stronger Earnings Guidance and Dividend Growth Projections Could Shape AEP's Long-Term Investment Story
summary: American Electric Power Company recently reaffirmed its fiscal 2025 operating earnings guidance, anticipating results toward the upper end ahead of its scheduled Q3 earnings report on October 29, 2025. Goldman Sachs added to the positive outlook by highlighting American Electric Power in its list of utilities anticipated to lead S&P 500 dividend growth in 2026, reflecting ongoing investor confidence in the sector. We’ll assess how the company’s stronger earnings guidance and focus on...

headline: Earnings Preview: American Electric Power (AEP) Q3 Earnings Expected to Decline
summary: AEP (AEP) doesn't possess the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.
